trans-unit.source: Environments in which Derby can run

seg-source.mrk: Environments in which Derby can run

target.mrk: Environments in which Derby can run

trans-unit.source: Before you configure your system to run <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph>, it is useful to understand something about the different environments in which <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> can run, because these environments affect the classpath, driver name, and database connection URL.

seg-source.mrk: Before you configure your system to run <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph>, it is useful to understand something about the different environments in which <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> can run, because these environments affect the classpath, driver name, and database connection URL.

target.mrk: Before you configure your system to run <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph>, it is useful to understand something about the different environments in which <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> can run, because these environments affect the classpath, driver name, and database connection URL.

trans-unit.source: See the <cite><ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citdevelop"></ph></cite> for more information on <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> environments.

seg-source.mrk: See the <cite><ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citdevelop"></ph></cite> for more information on <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> environments.
